comment: Perhaps a broad-based mulit-faith ecumenical "pray" with some passages from the Quran to start off with????
amr:
# ::snt Perhaps a broad-based mulit-faith ecumenical "pray" with some passages from the Quran to start off with????
(p / possible-01
      :ARG1 (t / thing
            :ARG1-of (p2 / pray-01)
            :mod (e / ecumenical)
            :ARG1-of (b / base-02
                  :ARG2 (b2 / broad-02))
            :mod (f / faith
                  :mod (m / mulit))
            :accompanier (p3 / passage
                  :quant (s / some)
                  :source (b3 / book
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Quran")))
            :ARG2-of (s2 / start-off-02))
      :polarity (a / amr-unknown))

comment: : Let us for the hostages taken in Sydney as well as the police handling the situation & for a peaceful resolution. !
amr:
# ::snt : Let us for the hostages taken in Sydney as well as the police handling the situation & for a peaceful resolution. !
(l / let-01
      :mode imperative
      :ARG0 (w / we)
      :ARG1 (a / and
            :op1 (h / hostage
                  :ARG1-of (t / take-01
                        :location (c / city
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Sydney"))))
            :op2 (p / police
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / handle-01
                        :ARG1 (s / situation)))
            :op3 (e / et-cetera))
      :purpose (r / resolve-01
            :manner (p2 / peaceful)))
